verbs.description: [ARG0: sixers miscues and turnovers] [V: spell] [ARG1: doom] [ARGM-ADV: losing on the road 122 - 97 to the nets] the sixers fell to 6 - 5 as they lost 122 - 97 to the nets in brooklyn on sunday november 4 2018 11 4 18 ben simmons led the team with 20 points and joel embiid added 16 points and 15 rebounds indiana pacers the road ben simmons philadelphia indiana philadelphia wells fargo center philadelphia joel embiid sixers nets wells fargo center
